title: Relates to the time to commence certain medical malpractice actions
summary: Relates to the time to commence certain medical malpractice actions; provides that actions related to acts or omissions of hospitals where an incident report is required to be filed may be filed within one year of the required filing.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules and the public health law, in relation to the time to commence certain malpractice actions
